answers.answer: I had my daughter at 35 wks via c section and this time I will have my baby girl at 37 wks. I'm a high risk pregnancy . Good luck I'm excited to meet my lil girl in about 15 wks. :)

I had my first at 35 weeks by emergency c section. And Im 27weeks pregnant with my second. My ob won't let me go full term so Im thinking my daughter will be born anywhere from thanksgiving to Dec 12.
Hi! I was 18 with my first, he came at 39w2d,Then my 2nd i was 26 & he came at 39w 6d lol so both a lil early I'm hoping this one will be early 2 :)
I had my first at 30 years old n she was born around 37 n a half weeks. N my due date this time is October 28th but I feel like I will give birth early:-) good luck with everything:-)
I was induced every time but 41wks, 38wks, and 39wks. I have to have a Csection this time and my doctor said she does those at 39wks.
I had first baby at 39w4d and second 39w6d... I went into early labor at 32/33 weeks with my second baby but was able to stop it due to the shots. :)

I was 17 with my first and had her I think a week late so I was 41 weeks before they induced me. Then I was 23 when I had my second and my water broke late on my due date. And I'm 25 and 39+2 and not sure when this one will come.
I was 19 with my first daughter and had her at 32 weeks. I was 27 with my second daughter and she too was early I had her at 34weeks. Good luck
My water broke at 40+4 and had her 40+5. Waiting to heal from my c-section so that we can ttc again. Have to do it quick before doc wants to do a hysterectomy.
I was 16 with my son and he came out at 36 weeks. He weighed 8lbs 2oz. Very healthy and I'm 22 now 32 weeks along now hopeing shell be early too
I had my first at 38 weeks but that's bc he has a heart problem and I was 37 in a half weeks before I found out....but my second one I'm due on March 1....
Had my first son when i was 21 via c section at 40 wks, he was 12.5 lbs hence the c section. This one im having sched c section at 39 wks
I was 37 1/2 weeks when my doctor induced, I ended up being a c-section.

35 weeks due to preeclampsia I was induced and had him vaginally. I'm 22 weeks about to be 23 weeks. I'm 28 years old. I had my first when I was 26 years old. I had a miscarriage at 21 and another at 25.

question: How far along were you guys when you had your babies?? This is my first and only 17 due november 21st :)
title: how far along were you??
